creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: shirt with woven silk on the top half over the shoulders and down center part way; rest is white cloth; woven silk is done with various vibrant colors in various patterns; metal clasp on one side of the shoulder; white cloth stitched together with black thread; two flowers of fabric--one on each shoulder by the neckline
title: Huipil
